channel.title: Admin Transfer
channel.description:
So, I'm an admin on a server that has it so admins can't trade, drop, view the general store, or do a drop party in the party room.
I need to transfer an item from my admin account to my main account.
Is there any other ways you can think of that I could try?
I don't have access to the source and I can't just ask the owner.
Please and thank you.

item.title: Admin Transfer
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Lol. I wouldn’t be doing this if the server was going to survive.

It’s got less than a week, may as well have some fun.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

Such loyalty in an Admin.

item.title: Admin Transfer
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Only admins can obtain it. Anyone can weild it.

Oh yeah, I forgot to mention, the owner is an idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin Transfer
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

CookieScape:

It’s an admin only item.

Then how are you going to use it on another account?

item.title: Admin Transfer
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“CookieScape, post:7, topic:436084”]Alright…

The only way I can think of is finding an NPC that has a general store that the owner doesn’t know about and spawning it.

Anyone else have any ideas?

And Runescape Sucks, I just am.

Do you have any ideas?[/quote]
Just be a bawss and get the items legit on another account

Read full topic

item.title: Admin Transfer
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“CookieScape, post:4, topic:436084”]The owner already said no.

The server is failing, and most likely getting shut down in the next week.

I don’t care about the morals of it, I just want it done.

.<[/quote]
Well if it is most likely closing then why even continue playing?

item.title: Admin Transfer
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I would still go to the owner, if he tells you no, it is for a reason. He may be wanting to keep the game fair for non-admin accounts.

Not sure if this kind of topic is allowed, I might be wrong though.
